consumables.name: Health Potion
consumables.desc: Need some HPs ? This potion will give you 30% of your total HP points !
consumables.costDesc: You need 1 Crystal to buy this item !

consumables.name: Attack Points Potion
consumables.desc: You're exhausted aren't you ? Use this potion to regain 20% of your total attack points !
consumables.costDesc: You need 1 Crystal to buy this item !

consumables.name: Shield Potion
consumables.desc: Your shield is gone ? Use this potion to regain 20% of your total shiled capacity !
consumables.costDesc: You need 3 Crystal to buy this item !

consumables.name: Critic Potion
consumables.desc: Need to slash some monsters ? Use this potion to increase your chances to attack with critical damage enabled !
consumables.costDesc: You need 6 Crystal to buy this item !

consumables.name: XP Potion
consumables.desc: Are you tired to slay so many monsters for not enough XP ? Try this potion that will give the character of your choice 2 level ups !
consumables.costDesc: You need 10 Crystal to buy this item !
